text: Ezɨ Godɨn Duam a gamizɨ, a ghua ovengezibar duar kalabusɨn itiba, akar aghuim me mɨkɨri.(3:19) Fofozir gumazir maba ghaze, duar kaba, da gumazir Noan dughiamɨn aremezir gumazibar duaba. Ezɨ marazi ghaze, a duabav gei, o enselɨn Godɨn akam iriaziba. Judaba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim iti, God Noan dughiamɨn duar kaba isa kalabus gatɨ.
